name: Shipping Method for Hermes Germany and WooCommerce
author: WPRuby

sections.description:
Shipping Method for Hermes and WooCommerce is a WordPress Plugin that integrate the Hermes parcel delivery (Germany) service, it will calculate the shipping cost for your customer.
If you have any issues or questions, please open a thread in the WordPress.org forum.

Disclaimer: This plugin is created and maintained by WPRuby.com using the publicly available information of Hermes Germany shipping prices. All product names and registered trademarks are property of their respective owners.
sections.installation:
Using The WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Search for ‘Shipping Method for Hermes and WooCommerce’
  3. Click ‘Install Now’
  4. Activate the plugin on the Plugin dashboard

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  3. Select hermes-germany-shipping-calculator-for-woocommerce.zip from your computer
  4. Click ‘Install Now’
  5. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download hermes-germany-shipping-calculator-for-woocommerce.zip
  2. Extract the hermes-germany-shipping-calculator-for-woocommerce directory to your computer
  3. Upload the hermes-germany-shipping-calculator-for-woocommerce directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
sections.faq:
Can I use this plugin to calculate international shipping?

No, this plugin only supports domestic shipping.
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Added: WordPress 6.4 compatibility.
  • Added: WooCommerce 6.4 compatibility.

1.0.2

  • Added: German Translations.

1.0.1

  • Updated: The correct text domain for translations.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
